reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater dress has beautiful quality, feels genuinely soft with a heavy material, and is comfortable and not itchy. They appreciate its style, particularly noting it looks best with a wide belt, and its warmth, being thick enough to keep them warm. The fit is loose enough to be cute, though opinions on length are mixed, with some finding it great while others say it's too short. Size opinions are also mixed, with some finding it true to size while others say it's a bit big. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy & stylish
items.body: This dress fit perfect style and warmth for fall with tall boots. It was not see through and holds up well after being washed and dried several times. Read more
items.author: Brittnee Snodgrass

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long enough to cover my a** when I lift my arms!!!
items.body: Honestly, LOVE this dress. Hereâ€™s my honest pros and cons list. For reference, I am 5â€™4â€, 34C/36B, 28â€ waist, and 40â€ hips at the widest point (aka big bottom girlies can reference this review for help!) Size purchased: Small Pros: - long enough that with or without something at my waist, when my arms go up, my butt is still covered - the cinching at the wrists is PERFECT - it is soft enough where those of us with sensory issues can wear this without a bra - color is is exact to picture Cons: - it is shapeless at the midsection, so it looks very silly on me without something cinching my waist - it is not 100% opaque. I donâ€™t care about my areola showing so I wonâ€™t be wearing a bra, but nude thong or something similar is the way to go - NOT squat proof ðŸ¤·ðŸ¼â€â™€ï¸ - when I stick my arms out or up, the sleeves will ride up about an inch. This doesnâ€™t bother me because I wear watches and bracelets but I can see this bothering tall folks FOR SURE - I havenâ€™t washed it yet and Iâ€™m a little nervous it will shrink if I dry it Overall, I planned to wear this with something tied at my waist because I knew this was not a bodycon dress. For my use, perfect. For someone who is trying to wear a bra or colored underwear, consider a darker color. Love that the length is not too short but still super cute. Read more
items.author: Madison Knabe

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and as expected
items.body: Iâ€™m happy with this sweater dress, for an Amazon purchase! TLDR; itâ€™s comfy and fits as expected. Quality doesnâ€™t blow me away, but no real issues and does what I was looking for. I ordered the apricot color because it looked ivory/cream in the photos. I would say itâ€™s more like a light beige in reality - a bit warmer/more tan than the picture - but still a good neutral tone that I can wear with brown or black. Iâ€™m usually an XS in tops and dresses (5â€™7â€, petite frame, ~120 lbs), but I wanted this to be A) long enough to fully cover my thighs, and B) not tight fitting, so I ordered the S which fits pretty much as I hoped. Itâ€™s short enough that Iâ€™d still want to wear it with tall boots but not too short. Nice and loose but not in a boxy way that looks like Iâ€™m swimming in it. Could be cute belted. The fabric was a little creased from being packaged, but it came mostly out after hanging for a while, and you could always steam it. I am VERY sensitive to itchy fabrics (canâ€™t wear wool and a lot of acrylics drive me crazy too) and this was comfy, smooth, stretchy fabric. Kind of mid-weight and not a scratchy kind of material at all. Not sure how long it will hold up (a little worried it will get stretched out around the bottom), but so far so good after one wear. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it! Comfy/Flattering
items.body: I am 5â€™7ish / 195 - usually wear a XL in tops 14/16 in bottoms and bought the Black in a XL. I have super long legs and was able to wear this as a dress & even was able to belt it and still had plenty of room in length. It was not tight on me and loose around the arms as depicted. Wish I had a photo Iâ€™ll upload one next time I wear it. It is super soft, comfortable and warm. The quality was definitely better than expected! Con- the only negative was, yes this is a turtle neck but it seemed like A LOT of fabric. I fixed this by tucking the neck of the sweater inside and then you can adjust how much you want to cover your neck. Read more
items.author: DH

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars I love it except two things....
items.body: I love the feel of this dress, it's soo soft and stretchy... really cute too! I bought it for the winter and it's extremely warm which is a plus. But after two washes, it shrank and is a bit too short to be office appropriate :/ for reference, I'm 5'2 and a normal weight, it covered about 2/3-1/2 of my thigh at first. Now it only covers a third of my thigh. Since it's so stretchy I may be able to stretch it with weights/heavy books but I wouldn't doubt that it would bounce back. Also the material is pretty thick and heavy, so while it's amazingly warm, I've only worn it 3 times. I also don't think I'd be able to wear it past early spring, which it now is. But it's a good around the house dress, I can put my arms and legs in and ball up in it when I'm cold haha Read more
items.author: Sadie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: This is a super soft knit sweater. I specifically was searching for â€œshort sweater dressesâ€ to wear with fleece leggings or regular leggings, as a warm, fashionable outfit (and for comfort, working a remote job). I ordered the teal color, and it goes well with my complexion and coloring. The small size fits well, but I may consider ordering up a size to accommodate more length and a cozier oversized feel. (For reference: Iâ€™m 5â€™7â€, 34DD, 145lbs.) I always wash my tops on gentle and hang to dry, and never have problems. Read more
items.author: Jill

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Like im swimming in a potato sack
items.body: I know it is oversized but the fit is comically big. I ordered my typical size thinking it would be a little baggy. Instead I was swimming in it! I could have easily ordered two sizes down! Read more
items.author: C RAY

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, stylish & bump friendly!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. So in love with this sweater dress. It is soo comfy and stretchy. I got a medium size, which is my typical size, and it still fits great at 6 months pregnant with room to grow. An amazing fall fashion find! Read more
items.author: Devin

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Pumpkin, Apricot, Black, Camel, Dark Green, Pink Apricot, White, Coffee Gray, Purple, Light Pink, Navyblue, Caramel. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
